images.caption: Figure 1:3D spatial reasoning performance comparisonacross leading models and human evaluation on 3DSRBench. Leading models (GPT-4o, Gemini-Pro, LLaVA-NeXT and Cambrian) lag behind human performance by at least-56%on average across four types of spatial relations (height, location, orientation, and multi-object). All models struggle with questions involving 3D orientation (e.g., “on the left”) and complex spatial reasoning (e.g., “viewpoint towards object”). SeeFig.2(a)for examples.

Figure 5:Failure cases of GPT-4o on our 3DSRBench.We find that GPT-4o cannot perform rigorous 3D spatial reasoning and resort to visual cues for reasoning. The bottom two examples show that GPT-4o cannot perform certain complicated 3D spatial reasoning and would produce a short and succinct guess instead.
